title: Module 7: Prompting
description: In this lab, practice effective prompting techniques to guide team discussions and decision-making. Through interactive exercises, learn to craft open-ended questions, clarify expectations, and foster collaborative problem-solving. Apply prompting skills to real-world scenarios, receiving feedback and refining your approach.

mcqs.question: What is the primary goal of prompting in team discussions?
What type of questions should be used to prompt team discussions?

flashcards.back: The act of guiding team discussions and decision-making through effective questioning and clarification
Questions that encourage discussion and cannot be answered with a simple 'yes' or 'no'

generated_text:
"Module 7: Prompting" (55 minutes, Intermediate)
In this lab, practice effective prompting techniques to guide team discussions and decision-making. Through interactive exercises, learn to craft open-ended questions, clarify expectations, and foster collaborative problem-solving. Apply prompting skills to real-world scenarios, receiving feedback and refining your approach.
